alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley; Hemphill; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 5:25PM CDT until August 13 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR WHEELER...NORTHERN COLLINGSWORTH...SOUTHEASTERN HEMPHILL AND NORTHEASTERN DONLEY COUNTIES... At 525 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Allison to 8 miles west of Sweetwater to 7 miles west of Dozier, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Shamrock, Briscoe, Wheeler, Allison, Lela, and Twitty. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
